subject: Black Friday
description_text:
Good afternoon,
I was planning on purchasing some pedals using a code from an ad I just
saw. BLACK45. I see this is now expired. Without the code, the pedals are
out of my price range and I will not buy them. Is there an active code I
can use? The 15 from NEW15 isn’t large enough for me to able to make the
purchase.
Thanks,
Thomas Cameron

conversations.body_text:
Good morning,
CRSM 30 seems to only work when making purchases larger than $200. The
pedals I wish to purchase are $179.
Thank you!

On Thu, Jan 15, 2026 at 12:36 AM service@simsonn.com
